channel.title: Need help with max level
channel.description: ok, here is the deal i know it sounds dumb but i cant figure it out... The source i got has max combat level 100 and i want it changed to 127 because max level for skills (attack,def, range...etc) is also 100 If anyone would help that ould be nice (im not changing source its a really good source)

item.title: Need help with max level
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Soul2 -Dark Soul-
item.description:
@Dark_Soul2 wrote:

when you search for getLevelForXP(int exp) you come up with something like this…

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
    int points = 0;
    int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 150; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) { 
            return lvl;
        }
    }                   
    return 150; <--Change that number to whatever max you want for every stat
                     Same goes for the number after lvl + but make sure there the same!

on there you need to change the the numbers after return, and lvl + to whatever number you need

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with max level
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Search for:

getLevelForXP(int exp)

In that method, you should see something like:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {

Change the 99, or whatever number is there, to the Max level you want your server to have.

Read full topic
